Despite losing one game, the Panthers were named National Champions by several selectors of national championships including the College Football Researchers Association, the New York Times computer poll, and the Sagarin Ratings, among others.[http://www.cfbdatawarehouse.com/data/div_ia/bigeast/pittsburgh/all_national_champs.php College Football Data Warehouse: Pittsburgh All National Championships, accessdate=2009-01-29] The university does not claim a national championships for this season, nor are the Panthers popularly recognized for winning that year's national championship.
